name: Search (Shuowangid)
description:
Post-truth is one of the most discussed words in our time. In the post-truth era, power-holders are willing to misuse all media kinds, including social media, to manipulate people's perceptions throughout the world. Since the cyber polarization caused by algorithms may be the leading psychological theory that power holders use to achieve their goals and isolate others' competing truths in the post-truth.This Game aims to remind people to look beyond their situated knowledge to the competing truths of any situation and avoid being in the echo chamber and turning to cyber-polarization.

If you can not play it, maybe you can try to download the game (only for the mac user).

BGM  in th end of game：

Radiohead-Everything in the right place

Radiohead-You and Whose army ?
